languages.text: "Благослови Великий род фон Валанциус за широту души вашей, шерин! И спасибо, что не отказали в разговоре". {n}Джай непривычно мнется, подбирая слова, что раньше стремительным потоком сами лились из уст.{/n} "Дело в том, шерин, что сеть моих "торговых представителей" недавно надорвалась, словно гипюровое платьице на шлюхе. Поставки сбоят, заказы не выполняются, клиенты звереют — и есть за что — а прибыль падает!"

traits.locale_text: "Благослови Великий род фон Валанциус за широту души вашей, шерин! И спасибо, что не отказали в разговоре". {n}Джай непривычно мнется, подбирая слова, что раньше стремительным потоком сами лились из уст.{/n} "Дело в том, шерин, что сеть моих "торговых представителей" недавно надорвалась, словно гипюровое платьице на шлюхе. Поставки сбоят, заказы не выполняются, клиенты звереют — и есть за что — а прибыль падает!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "The Exalted One bless the house of von Valancius for your largesse of spirit, shereen! And thank you for deigning to speak with me." {n}Jae turns unusually hesitant, now tentatively choosing the words that only a moment ago rolled off her tongue in an uninterrupted cascade.{/n} "Here's the thing, shereen — my network of 'trade representatives' has been stretched a little too thin recently, like a chiffon dress on a whore. Supplies are all over the place, orders aren't being filled, clients are kicking off — and not without reason — and revenue's plummeting!"
languages.original_text: "Благослови Великий род фон Валанциус за широту души вашей, шерин! И спасибо, что не отказали в разговоре". {n}Джай непривычно мнется, подбирая слова, что раньше стремительным потоком сами лились из уст.{/n} "Дело в том, шерин, что сеть моих "торговых представителей" недавно надорвалась, словно гипюровое платьице на шлюхе. Поставки сбоят, заказы не выполняются, клиенты звереют — и есть за что — а прибыль падает!"

And thank you for deigning to speak with me." {n}Jae turns unusually hesitant, now tentatively choosing the words that only a moment ago rolled off her tongue in an uninterrupted cascade.{/n} "Here's the thing, shereen — my network of 'trade representatives' has been stretched a little too thin recently, like a chiffon dress on a whore. Supplies are all over the place, orders aren't being filled, clients are kicking off — and not without reason — and revenue's plummeting!"

Supplies are all over the place, orders aren't being filled, clients are kicking off — and not without reason — and revenue's plummeting!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンは、あんたのその精神の大きさを称えてフォン・ヴァランシウス家を祝福してくださるはずよ、シャリーン。それから、あたしと話すことに快く応じてくれてありがとう」{n}ジェイは珍しく躊躇し、ついさっきまで途切れることなく舌から転がり落ちた言葉を、今度はためらいつつ選ぶ。{/n}「問題はね、シャリーン、最近、あたしの『貿易代表者』のネットワークが、売春婦のシフォンドレスみたいに、少しばかり薄くなりすぎているのよね。物資はあちらこちらにあって、注文は満たされていない。顧客は忙しくなってきてる…それには理由がないはずがないわ…そして収益が激減しているの！」
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One bless the house of von Valancius for your largesse of spirit, shereen! And thank you for deigning to speak with me." {n}Jae turns unusually hesitant, now tentatively choosing the words that only a moment ago rolled off her tongue in an uninterrupted cascade.{/n} "Here's the thing, shereen — my network of 'trade representatives' has been stretched a little too thin recently, like a chiffon dress on a whore. Supplies are all over the place, orders aren't being filled, clients are kicking off — and not without reason — and revenue's plummeting!"

traits.locale_text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンは、あんたのその精神の大きさを称えてフォン・ヴァランシウス家を祝福してくださるはずよ、シャリーン。それから、あたしと話すことに快く応じてくれてありがとう」{n}ジェイは珍しく躊躇し、ついさっきまで途切れることなく舌から転がり落ちた言葉を、今度はためらいつつ選ぶ。{/n}「問題はね、シャリーン、最近、あたしの『貿易代表者』のネットワークが、売春婦のシフォンドレスみたいに、少しばかり薄くなりすぎているのよね。物資はあちらこちらにあって、注文は満たされていない。顧客は忙しくなってきてる…それには理由がないはずがないわ…そして収益が激減しているの！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “感谢你的慷慨，亲爱的！愿至高无上的神皇保佑冯·瓦兰修斯家族！还有，感谢你赏脸，愿意和我谈谈。”{n}婕伊刚刚还在滔滔不绝地说着，此刻却变得犹犹豫豫，仔细地斟酌着措辞。{/n}“事情是这样的，亲爱的——我的‘贸易代表’网络最近有些捉襟见肘，就像酒鬼口袋里的钱一样入不敷出。供应商散落得到处都是，订单也无法完成，客户自然也很不满意。他们把我们一脚踢开，我们的收入急剧下降！”
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One bless the house of von Valancius for your largesse of spirit, shereen! And thank you for deigning to speak with me." {n}Jae turns unusually hesitant, now tentatively choosing the words that only a moment ago rolled off her tongue in an uninterrupted cascade.{/n} "Here's the thing, shereen — my network of 'trade representatives' has been stretched a little too thin recently, like a chiffon dress on a whore. Supplies are all over the place, orders aren't being filled, clients are kicking off — and not without reason — and revenue's plummeting!"

traits.locale_text: “感谢你的慷慨，亲爱的！愿至高无上的神皇保佑冯·瓦兰修斯家族！还有，感谢你赏脸，愿意和我谈谈。”{n}婕伊刚刚还在滔滔不绝地说着，此刻却变得犹犹豫豫，仔细地斟酌着措辞。{/n}“事情是这样的，亲爱的——我的‘贸易代表’网络最近有些捉襟见肘，就像酒鬼口袋里的钱一样入不敷出。供应商散落得到处都是，订单也无法完成，客户自然也很不满意。他们把我们一脚踢开，我们的收入急剧下降！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Que el Exaltado bendiga la casa von Valancius por ese espíritu tan generoso, shereen! Gracias por dignarse a hablar conmigo». {n}A Jae le invade una extraña indecisión y pasa a elegir tímidamente las palabras que, hasta hace un momento, tejían una verborrea que brotaba de su lengua.{/n} «El problema es el siguiente, shereen: mi red de "representantes comerciales" se ha estirado más que el vestido de una puta. Hay suministros desperdigados, pedidos que no se entregan, clientes que se piran... y razón no les falta. ¡Nos estamos quedando sin ingresos!».
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One bless the house of von Valancius for your largesse of spirit, shereen! And thank you for deigning to speak with me." {n}Jae turns unusually hesitant, now tentatively choosing the words that only a moment ago rolled off her tongue in an uninterrupted cascade.{/n} "Here's the thing, shereen — my network of 'trade representatives' has been stretched a little too thin recently, like a chiffon dress on a whore. Supplies are all over the place, orders aren't being filled, clients are kicking off — and not without reason — and revenue's plummeting!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el Exaltado bendiga la casa von Valancius por ese espíritu tan generoso, shereen! Gracias por dignarse a hablar conmigo». {n}A Jae le invade una extraña indecisión y pasa a elegir tímidamente las palabras que, hasta hace un momento, tejían una verborrea que brotaba de su lengua.{/n} «El problema es el siguiente, shereen: mi red de "representantes comerciales" se ha estirado más que el vestido de una puta. Hay suministros desperdigados, pedidos que no se entregan, clientes que se piran... y razón no les falta. ¡Nos estamos quedando sin ingresos!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Puisse l'Exalté bénir la maison von Valancius au nom de votre grandeur d'esprit, shereen ! Je vous remercie d'avoir daigné m'adresser la parole. » {n}Jae commence étonnamment à hésiter, peinant soudain à choisir les mots qui sortaient auparavant de sa bouche en une cascade ininterrompue.{/n} « Je dois vous dire, shereen : ces derniers temps, mon réseau de "représentants commerciaux" s'étiole comme les guenilles d'une catin en fin de nuit. Nos stocks ne sont plus centralisés, les commandes ne sont pas honorées, les clients vont logiquement voir ailleurs... et les revenus sont en chute libre ! »
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One bless the house of von Valancius for your largesse of spirit, shereen! And thank you for deigning to speak with me." {n}Jae turns unusually hesitant, now tentatively choosing the words that only a moment ago rolled off her tongue in an uninterrupted cascade.{/n} "Here's the thing, shereen — my network of 'trade representatives' has been stretched a little too thin recently, like a chiffon dress on a whore. Supplies are all over the place, orders aren't being filled, clients are kicking off — and not without reason — and revenue's plummeting!"

traits.locale_text: « Puisse l'Exalté bénir la maison von Valancius au nom de votre grandeur d'esprit, shereen ! Je vous remercie d'avoir daigné m'adresser la parole. » {n}Jae commence étonnamment à hésiter, peinant soudain à choisir les mots qui sortaient auparavant de sa bouche en une cascade ininterrompue.{/n} « Je dois vous dire, shereen : ces derniers temps, mon réseau de "représentants commerciaux" s'étiole comme les guenilles d'une catin en fin de nuit. Nos stocks ne sont plus centralisés, les commandes ne sont pas honorées, les clients vont logiquement voir ailleurs... et les revenus sont en chute libre ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Der Erhabene segne das Haus von Valancius für Eure Freigebigkeit, Shereen! Und danke, dass Ihr mit mir sprecht." {n}Jae zögert ungewöhnlich lange und überlegt sich die Worte sehr genau, die ihr soeben noch ununterbrochen wie ein Wasserfall von der Zunge gesprudelt waren.{/n} "Die Sache ist die, Shereen – mein Netzwerk von 'Handelsrepräsentanten' hat sich in letzter Zeit etwas zu sehr ausgedünnt, wie das Chiffonkleid einer Hure. Die Vorräte sind überall, Bestellungen werden nicht erfüllt, Kunden springen ab – mit gutem Grund –, und der Umsatz bricht ein!"
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One bless the house of von Valancius for your largesse of spirit, shereen! And thank you for deigning to speak with me." {n}Jae turns unusually hesitant, now tentatively choosing the words that only a moment ago rolled off her tongue in an uninterrupted cascade.{/n} "Here's the thing, shereen — my network of 'trade representatives' has been stretched a little too thin recently, like a chiffon dress on a whore. Supplies are all over the place, orders aren't being filled, clients are kicking off — and not without reason — and revenue's plummeting!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Erhabene segne das Haus von Valancius für Eure Freigebigkeit, Shereen! Und danke, dass Ihr mit mir sprecht." {n}Jae zögert ungewöhnlich lange und überlegt sich die Worte sehr genau, die ihr soeben noch ununterbrochen wie ein Wasserfall von der Zunge gesprudelt waren.{/n} "Die Sache ist die, Shereen – mein Netzwerk von 'Handelsrepräsentanten' hat sich in letzter Zeit etwas zu sehr ausgedünnt, wie das Chiffonkleid einer Hure. Die Vorräte sind überall, Bestellungen werden nicht erfüllt, Kunden springen ab – mit gutem Grund –, und der Umsatz bricht ein!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ruhunun yüceliğini gören Görkemli, von Valancius hanesini kutsasın şirinim! Benimle konuşmayı uygun gördüğün için teşekkür ederim." {n}Jae, hiç olmadığı kadar çekimser görünüyor. Biraz önce olsa hiç düşünmeden sarf edeceği sözleri şimdi dikkatle, seçerek söylüyor.{/n} "Mesele şu ki şirinim... 'Ticaret temsilcisi' tanıdıklarım azala azala bir elin parmakları kadar kaldı. Tedarik desen yok, siparişler yetişmiyor, müşteriler kaçıyor... Ki bence haklılar... Hasılat dibi boyluyor!"
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One bless the house of von Valancius for your largesse of spirit, shereen! And thank you for deigning to speak with me." {n}Jae turns unusually hesitant, now tentatively choosing the words that only a moment ago rolled off her tongue in an uninterrupted cascade.{/n} "Here's the thing, shereen — my network of 'trade representatives' has been stretched a little too thin recently, like a chiffon dress on a whore. Supplies are all over the place, orders aren't being filled, clients are kicking off — and not without reason — and revenue's plummeting!"

traits.locale_text: "Görkemli, von Valancius hanesine ruhun gibi cömert olsun şirinim! Benimle konuşmayı uygun gördüğün için teşekkür ederim." {n}Jae, hiç olmadığı kadar çekimser görünüyor. Biraz önce olsa hiç düşünmeden sarf edeceği sözleri şimdi dikkatle, seçerek söylüyor.{/n} "Mesele şu ki şirinim... "tacir temsilcisi" tanıdıklarım azala azala kaltak donu kadar kaldı. Tedarik desen yok, siparişler yetişmiyor, müşteriler kaçıyor... Ki bence haklılar... Hasılat dibi boyluyor!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
